description: Ryan and Hunter were chilling together at Ryan's house. They had just graduated from High School but hadn't seen each other since graduation day. Ryan chose this time to come out to Hunter. And to Ryan's surprise, Hunter was bi curious. It doesn't take much more than that for 2 18 year old boys to start ripping their clothes off and sucking and fucking like wild, hormone-charged teens. These cum soaked teens are hot as fuck.
title: So Hard
